title: Car-Point
features: This is a Car showroom related application
Must be loggedin before buying a car
Users can buy car from the website
An admin can add,remove and update item

title: Travel-Adventure
features: Travel-Adventure is a tour related website
Users can book ticket from the website
Must be loggedin before booking a ticket. Click book then can login from login page.
An admin can add,remove and update package

title: Store-Management
features: This is a store management application
Users can see all items of the store
An admin can add,remove and update item
When user will deliver item it will be removed from item list
